channel.title: Zev Ross on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Zev Ross on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: R, me hearties
item.description: I've been fond of maps and graphs for a long time, but haven't had a good set of tools to play with that easily generate decent versions of same from various data sets I've found or accumulated. The small hope is that a little bit of hacking on the right tools will fix this. One of the tools of choice is R, a language for statistics and data analysis. It's tremendously powerful and a bit complicated, but I'm not trying to learn the whole thing; rather, I'm after just the barest minimum so that I can competently generate a scatterplot of data and place it onto a map.
